segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 10
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 10

segments.pli: 11. Samaṇasaññāvagga
segments.en: 11. Perceptions for Ascetics

segments.pli: 106. Nijjarasutta
segments.en: 106. Wearing Away

segments.pli: “Dasayimāni, bhikkhave, nijjaravatthūni.
segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these ten grounds for wearing away.

segments.pli: Katamāni dasa?
segments.en: What ten?

segments.pli: Sammādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hoti;
segments.en: For one of right view, wrong view is worn away.

segments.pli: ye ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong view are worn away.

segments.pli: sammādiṭṭhipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. (1)
segments.en: And because of right view, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

segments.pli: Sammāsaṅkappassa, bhikkhave, micchāsaṅkappo nijjiṇṇo hoti;
segments.en: For one of right thought, wrong thought is worn away.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāsaṅkappapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong thought are worn away.

segments.pli: sammāsaṅkappapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. (2)
segments.en: And because of right thought, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

segments.pli: Sammāvācassa, bhikkhave, micchāvācā nijjiṇṇā hoti;
segments.en: For one of right speech, wrong speech is worn away.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāvācāpaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong speech are worn away.

segments.pli: sammāvācāpaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. (3)
segments.en: And because of right speech, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

segments.pli: Sammākammantassa, bhikkhave, micchākammanto nijjiṇṇo hoti;
segments.en: For one of right action, wrong action is worn away.

segments.pli: ye ca micchākammantapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong action are worn away.

segments.pli: sammākammantapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. (4)
segments.en: And because of right action, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

segments.pli: Sammāājīvassa, bhikkhave, micchāājīvo nijjiṇṇo hoti;
segments.en: For one of right livelihood, wrong livelihood is worn away.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāājīvapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong livelihood are worn away.

segments.pli: sammāājīvapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. (5)
segments.en: And because of right livelihood, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

segments.pli: Sammāvāyāmassa, bhikkhave, micchāvāyāmo nijjiṇṇo hoti;
segments.en: For one of right effort, wrong effort is worn away.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāvāyāmapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong effort are worn away.

segments.pli: sammāvāyāmapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. (6)
segments.en: And because of right effort, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

segments.pli: Sammāsatissa, bhikkhave, micchāsati nijjiṇṇā hoti;
segments.en: For one of right mindfulness, wrong mindfulness is worn away.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāsatipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong mindfulness are worn away.

segments.pli: sammāsatipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. (7)
segments.en: And because of right mindfulness, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

segments.pli: Sammāsamādhissa, bhikkhave, micchāsamādhi nijjiṇṇo hoti;
segments.en: For one of right immersion, wrong immersion is worn away.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāsamādhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong immersion are worn away.

segments.pli: sammāsamādhipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. (8)
segments.en: And because of right immersion, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

segments.pli: Sammāñāṇissa, bhikkhave, micchāñāṇaṃ nijjiṇṇaṃ hoti;
segments.en: For one of right knowledge, wrong knowledge is worn away.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāñāṇapaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong knowledge are worn away.

segments.pli: sammāñāṇapaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. (9)
segments.en: And because of right knowledge, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

segments.pli: Sammāvimuttissa, bhikkhave, micchāvimutti nijjiṇṇā hoti;
segments.en: For one of right freedom, wrong freedom is worn away.

segments.pli: ye ca micchāvimuttipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa nijjiṇṇā honti;
segments.en: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong freedom are worn away.

segments.pli: sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. (10)
segments.en: And because of right freedom, many skillful qualities are fully developed.

segments.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, dasa nijjaravatthūnī”ti.
segments.en: These are the ten grounds for wearing away.”

segments.pli: Chaṭṭhaṃ.

sections.title: For one of right thought, wrong thought is worn…

suttaplex.blurb: Each of the ten path factors wears away its opposite.
